parameters.name: CurveBound
parameters.description: Array of 6 doubles representing the start and end points of the curve

title: ISurface.GetIntersectCurveCount2
description: Gets the number of points for a surface-curve intersection.
signature:
System.Int32 GetIntersectCurveCount2( 
   Curve
OtherCurve
,
   ref System.Double
CurveBound
)

parameters.name: CurveBound
parameters.description: Array of 6 doubles representing the start and end points of the curve

remarks:
Visual Basic and C++ Dispatch applications should use
ISurface::IntersectCurve2
instead of this method.
